page.title: 09Games.
page.content: Outside school we play kickstone lurky, hoola-hoop,skipping,kite-flying,footbal bike-riding and catch the ball. If it is dry we play in Lamb's field. There are cow pats all over! So it is better to be careful.In the village we have a tiny play area with stepping stones and swings and climbing frames. On dark nights we play inside with other children. We play with "My little ponies".Computers are a big favourite with most children in the village.I think that most children still like to play games and have fun together. We don't play board games as much as people used to do.I think that is because when we are having quiet times we watch television or play with our computers.Monopoly is a popular board game- most children have one.Perhaps T/V may not be so popular this winter!
